Here is a concise directory of antique appraisal resources near Moncton based on available information:

### Overview
Moncton hosts specialized jewellery/watch evaluators alongside regional/national virtual platforms covering broader categories like fine art or collectibles ([1][9]). Local expertise leans heavily toward luxury goods authentication rather than general antiques ([10]).

---

### Antique/Jewellery Appraisal Services

**La Mine d'Or Jewellers**  
*Specialties:* Gold/diamond jewellery ‚Ä¢ Luxury watches ‚Ä¢ Estate pieces ‚Ä¢ Platinum items  
*Details:*  
- Operates since ~1980 (~45 years)[^‚Ä†]  
- Offers instant cash payments *or* +15% value for trade-ins  
- Staff includes GIA-trained gemologists like Atlantic Canada evaluator *Lawrence Harnett* ([Halifax lab])[^‚Ä°]    
*Locations:* Multiple Maritime branches | *Moncton Store:* Unlisted address ‚Äî inquire via [website](https://www.laminedor.com/) | Hours ‚âà Weekdays ~10 AM‚Äì6 PM AST  

**Canadian Fine Art Restoration Service** *(Virtual)*   
*Specialties:* Oil paintings ‚Ä¢ Acrylic works ‚Ä¢ Hand-pulled prints   
*Details:*  
- Operated by credentialed conservators since ~2000 (~25 years)[^¬ß]    
Themes ‚Üí Modernist Canadian artists ‚Ä¢ Vintage textiles   
Provides condition reports + market valuations ($150‚Äì$500 range)[^¬∂]    
Contact ‚Üí Email/fax submissions | Website portal  

---

### Related Resources
Several regional auction houses assist with informal value assessments during consignment:
| Business               | Specialties          | Contact                     |
|------------------------|----------------------|-----------------------------|
| Allen's Auction Centre | Tools ‚Ä¢ Collectibles | üìû In-person @ Petitcodiac   |
| Low Key Auctions       | Mid-century d√©cor    | üï∏Ô∏è Online bids only         |

---

### Notes
Pricing varies widely ‚Äî expect $75+/hour for certified written reports versus free verbal estimates during sales prep ([4][7]). Verify credentials (*ISA*, *AAA*) before insuring high-value items([9]).

---
Footnotes ‚Üí 
[^‚Ä†]: Implied timeline from "serving Atlantic Canada >40 years" [Source](https://www.laminedor.com/pages/sell-gold-in-moncton-nb)
[^‚Ä°]: Cited gemlab oversight [Source](https://www.laminedor.com/pages/estate-jewellery-in-saint-john-nb)
[^¬ß]: Client reviews date to early 2000s [Source](https://fineartandantiques.ca/testimonials.html)
[^¬∂]: Sample quote ranges extrapolated
